alert.note: Alert for Coastal Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued July 03 at 3:48PM EDT until July 04 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Water levels will approach flood stage from Portland and points south along the coast tonight. Any isolated pockets of flooding will be minor. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 1 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly just isolated pockets of minor flooding possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 AM 10.5 1.7 0.7 2 None 04/01 PM 8.5 -0.3 0.2 2 None 05/01 AM 10.2 1.4 0.2 2 None 05/02 PM 8.8 -0.0 0.3 2 None 06/02 AM 10.4 1.6 0.3 2 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 AM 10.8 1.3 0.6 2 None 04/01 PM 8.7 -0.8 0.2 2 None 05/01 AM 10.6 1.1 0.2 2 None 05/02 PM 9.0 -0.5 0.3 2 None 06/02 AM 10.6 1.1 0.3 2 None Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 04/12 AM 11.9 2.2 0.7 2 None 04/01 PM 9.7 -0.0 0.3 1-2 None 05/01 AM 11.7 2.0 0.3 2 None 05/01 PM 9.9 0.2 0.3 2 None 06/02 AM 11.8 2.1 0.4 2 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
